trans-unit.source: Architecture overview that covers common design patterns

trans-unit.source: Application Architecture on Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Application Architecture on Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Resources for building applications that use Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: Resources for building applications that use Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: This includes tools to help you draw diagrams to visually describe software systems.
trans-unit.target: This includes tools to help you draw diagrams to visually describe software systems.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft architecture certification course
trans-unit.target: Microsoft architecture certification course

trans-unit.source: Microsoft just released a new architecture course supporting Microsoft certification exam 70-534.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft just released a new architecture course supporting Microsoft certification exam 70-534.

trans-unit.source: It's [available for free on EDX.ORG](https://www.edx.org/course/architecting-microsoft-azure-solutions-microsoft-dev205x).
trans-unit.target: It's [available for free on EDX.ORG](https://www.edx.org/course/architecting-microsoft-azure-solutions-microsoft-dev205x).

trans-unit.source: It uses the new [3D Blueprint Visio Template](#3d-blueprint-visio-template).
trans-unit.target: It uses the new [3D Blueprint Visio Template](#3d-blueprint-visio-template).

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Architecture certification course
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Architecture certification course

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Architecture Blueprints
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Architecture Blueprints

trans-unit.source: Microsoft publishes a set of high level [architecture blueprints](http://aka.ms/azblueprints) showing how to build specific types of systems using Microsoft products.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft publishes a set of high level [architecture blueprints](http://aka.ms/azblueprints) showing how to build specific types of systems using Microsoft products.

trans-unit.source: Each blueprint includes a
trans-unit.target: Each blueprint includes a

trans-unit.source: Flat **2D Visio** 2003-based file that you can download and modify
trans-unit.target: Flat **2D Visio** 2003-based file that you can download and modify

trans-unit.source: Colorful **3D perspective PDF** file to introduce the blueprint to less technical audiences
trans-unit.target: Colorful **3D perspective PDF** file to introduce the blueprint to less technical audiences

trans-unit.source: **Video** that walks through the 3D version.
trans-unit.target: **Video** that walks through the 3D version.

trans-unit.source: The Blueprints use the [Cloud and Enterprise Symbol Set](#symbol-and-icon-sets).
trans-unit.target: The Blueprints use the [Cloud and Enterprise Symbol Set](#symbol-and-icon-sets).

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Architecture Blueprint 3D diagram
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Architecture Blueprint 3D diagram

trans-unit.source: 3D Blueprint Visio Template
trans-unit.target: 3D Blueprint Visio Template

trans-unit.source: The 3D versions of the [Microsoft Architecture Blueprints](http://aka.ms/azblueprints) were initially created in a non-Microsoft tool, but a new Visio 2013 template shipped on Aug 5, 2015 as part of a [Microsoft Architecture certification course distributed on EDX.ORG](#microsoft-architecture-certification-course).
trans-unit.target: The 3D versions of the [Microsoft Architecture Blueprints](http://aka.ms/azblueprints) were initially created in a non-Microsoft tool, but a new Visio 2013 template shipped on Aug 5, 2015 as part of a [Microsoft Architecture certification course distributed on EDX.ORG](#microsoft-architecture-certification-course).

trans-unit.source: The template is also available outside the course.
trans-unit.target: The template is also available outside the course.

trans-unit.source: [View the training video](http://aka.ms/3dBlueprintTemplateVideo) first so you know what it can do
trans-unit.target: [View the training video](http://aka.ms/3dBlueprintTemplateVideo) first so you know what it can do

trans-unit.source: Download the [Microsoft 3d Blueprint Visio Template](http://aka.ms/3DBlueprintTemplate)
trans-unit.target: Download the [Microsoft 3d Blueprint Visio Template](http://aka.ms/3DBlueprintTemplate)

trans-unit.source: Download the [Cloud and Enterprise Symbols](#symbol-and-icon-sets) to use with the 3D template
trans-unit.target: Download the [Cloud and Enterprise Symbols](#symbol-and-icon-sets) to use with the 3D template

trans-unit.source: Email us at [CnESymbols@microsoft.com](mailto:CnESymbols@microsoft.com) for specific questions not answered by the training materials or to give feedback.
trans-unit.target: Email us at [CnESymbols@microsoft.com](mailto:CnESymbols@microsoft.com) for specific questions not answered by the training materials or to give feedback.

trans-unit.source: Usability is one of the primary goals of the template so let us know what's good and what gets in the way.
trans-unit.target: Usability is one of the primary goals of the template so let us know what's good and what gets in the way.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft 3D Blueprint Visio Template
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 3D Blueprint Visio Template

trans-unit.source: Symbol and icon sets
trans-unit.target: Symbol and icon sets

trans-unit.source: [View the Visio and symbols training video](http://aka.ms/CnESymbolsVideo) and then [download the Cloud and Enterprise Symbol set](http://aka.ms/CnESymbols) to help create technical materials that describe Azure, Windows Server, SQL Server and more.
trans-unit.target: [View the Visio and symbols training video](http://aka.ms/CnESymbolsVideo) and then [download the Cloud and Enterprise Symbol set](http://aka.ms/CnESymbols) to help create technical materials that describe Azure, Windows Server, SQL Server and more.

trans-unit.source: You can use the symbols in architecture diagrams, training materials, presentations, datasheets, infographics, whitepapers and even 3rd party books if the book trains people to use Microsoft products.
trans-unit.target: You can use the symbols in architecture diagrams, training materials, presentations, datasheets, infographics, whitepapers and even 3rd party books if the book trains people to use Microsoft products.

trans-unit.source: However, they are not meant for use in user interfaces.
trans-unit.target: However, they are not meant for use in user interfaces.

trans-unit.source: The CnE symbols are in Visio and PNG formats.
trans-unit.target: The CnE symbols are in Visio and PNG formats.

trans-unit.source: Additional instructions on how to use the PNGs in PowerPoint are included in the set.
trans-unit.target: Additional instructions on how to use the PNGs in PowerPoint are included in the set.

trans-unit.source: The symbol set ships quarterly and is updated as new services are released.
trans-unit.target: The symbol set ships quarterly and is updated as new services are released.

trans-unit.source: Additional symbols are available in the [Microsoft Office Visio stencil](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35772), though they are not optimized for architectural diagrams like the CnE set is.
trans-unit.target: Additional symbols are available in the [Microsoft Office Visio stencil](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35772), though they are not optimized for architectural diagrams like the CnE set is.

trans-unit.source: **Feedback:** If you've used the CnE symbols, fill out the short 5 question [survey](http://aka.ms/azuresymbolssurveyv2) or email us at [CnESymbols@microsoft.com](mailto:CnESymbols@microsoft.com) for specific questions and issues.
trans-unit.target: **Feedback:** If you've used the CnE symbols, fill out the short 5 question [survey](http://aka.ms/azuresymbolssurveyv2) or email us at [CnESymbols@microsoft.com](mailto:CnESymbols@microsoft.com) for specific questions and issues.

trans-unit.source: We’d like to know what you think, including positive feedback so we know to continue to invest time in them.
trans-unit.target: We’d like to know what you think, including positive feedback so we know to continue to invest time in them.

trans-unit.source: Cloud and Enterprise Symbol/Icon set
trans-unit.target: Cloud and Enterprise Symbol/Icon set

trans-unit.source: Azure Architectural Design Patterns
trans-unit.target: Azure Architectural Design Patterns

trans-unit.source: Microsoft publishes series of architectural design patterns to help you compose your own custom designs.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft publishes series of architectural design patterns to help you compose your own custom designs.

trans-unit.source: The patterns are intended to be concise architectural guides which can be composed together in order provide guidance on how to best leverage the Microsoft Azure platform to solve your organization’s business needs.
trans-unit.target: The patterns are intended to be concise architectural guides which can be composed together in order provide guidance on how to best leverage the Microsoft Azure platform to solve your organization’s business needs.

trans-unit.source: [Overview](../azure-architectures-cpif-overview/) -
trans-unit.target: [Overview](../azure-architectures-cpif-overview/) -

trans-unit.source: [Hybrid networking](../azure-architectures-cpif-infrastructure-hybrid-networking/) -
trans-unit.target: [Hybrid networking](../azure-architectures-cpif-infrastructure-hybrid-networking/) -

trans-unit.source: [Offsite batch processing](../azure-architectures-cpif-foundation-offsite-batch-processing-tier/) -
trans-unit.target: [Offsite batch processing](../azure-architectures-cpif-foundation-offsite-batch-processing-tier/) -

trans-unit.source: [Multi-site data tier](../azure-architectures-cpif-foundation-multi-site-data-tier/) -
trans-unit.target: [Multi-site data tier](../azure-architectures-cpif-foundation-multi-site-data-tier/) -

trans-unit.source: [Global load balanced web tier](../azure-architectures-cpif-foundation-global-load-balanced-web-tier/) -
trans-unit.target: [Global load balanced web tier](../azure-architectures-cpif-foundation-global-load-balanced-web-tier/) -

trans-unit.target: [Azure search tier](../azure-architectures-cpif-foundation-azure-search-tier/)

trans-unit.source: Each pattern contains
trans-unit.target: Each pattern contains

trans-unit.source: A service description
trans-unit.target: A service description

trans-unit.source: A list of Azure Services required to leverage the pattern
trans-unit.target: A list of Azure Services required to leverage the pattern

trans-unit.source: Architectural diagrams
trans-unit.target: Architectural diagrams

trans-unit.source: Architectural dependencies
trans-unit.target: Architectural dependencies

trans-unit.source: Design limitations or considerations that may impact the pattern
trans-unit.target: Design limitations or considerations that may impact the pattern

trans-unit.source: Interfaces and endpoints
trans-unit.target: Interfaces and endpoints

trans-unit.source: Anti-patterns
trans-unit.target: Anti-patterns

trans-unit.source: Key high-level architecture considerations including availability and resiliency, composite SLAs for services used, scale and performance, cost and operational considerations.
trans-unit.target: Key high-level architecture considerations including availability and resiliency, composite SLAs for services used, scale and performance, cost and operational considerations.

trans-unit.target: Azure Architecture Design patterns

trans-unit.source: Design patterns poster
trans-unit.target: Design patterns poster

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Patterns and Practices has published the book [Cloud Design Patterns](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn568099.aspx) which is available both on MSDN and in PDF download.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Patterns and Practices has published the book [Cloud Design Patterns](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn568099.aspx) which is available both on MSDN and in PDF download.

trans-unit.source: There is also a large format poster available which lists all the patterns.
trans-unit.target: There is also a large format poster available which lists all the patterns.

trans-unit.source: Patterns and Practices Cloud Patterns Poster
trans-unit.target: Patterns and Practices Cloud Patterns Poster

trans-unit.source: Architecture Infographics
trans-unit.target: Architecture Infographics

trans-unit.source: Microsoft publishes several architecture related posters/infographics.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft publishes several architecture related posters/infographics.

trans-unit.source: They include [Building Real-World Cloud Applications](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/infographics/building-real-world-cloud-apps/) and [Scaling with Cloud Services](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/infographics/cloud-services/) .
trans-unit.target: They include [Building Real-World Cloud Applications](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/infographics/building-real-world-cloud-apps/) and [Scaling with Cloud Services](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/infographics/cloud-services/) .
